job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtAt Quinn were on a mission to redefine productivityby connecting to the tools you use every day automating repetitive tasks and powering your potentialltstronggt Our greatest excitement comes from imagining a future where your tools work for you and were building the most capable team to make that a realityltbrgtltbrgtWere not taking a traditional approach and were not looking for conventional thinkers Working at Quinn on the early team puts you at the cornerstone of building a world where technology connects and works in harmonyoptimizing the lives of yourself and othersltbrgtltbrgtWere exceptionally proud of the company weve built so far and humbled by the work we have yet to accomplish Our people are Quinns most significant competitive advantage and well continue investing in them as a cornerstone of our cultureltbrgtltbrgtKey ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtAs an early team member you will get a chance to shape both the foundations of our product and team culture We will measure your success by your ability to ship fast learn quickly and contribute to our culture of continuous improvement Additionally you willltbrgtltulgtltligtStudy and transform data science prototypesltligtltligtResearch and implement appropriate ML algorithms and toolsltligtltligtDevelop machine learning applications according to requirementsltligtltligtPerform statistical analysis and finetuning using test resultsltligtltligtTrain and retrain systems when necessaryltligtltligtExtend existing ML libraries and frameworksltligtltligtKeep abreast of developments in the fieldltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout Youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Youre productminded You have a sense of excellent user experience and feel for when something is off You love talking to your team and your customers and you build for bothltligtltligt Youre a doer You enjoy all aspects of building a product and are comfortable taking a unique approach when necessary You create solutions that will lead our company and our industry  on each project every dayltligtltligt Youre steadfast You handle chaos ambiguity and complexity in a clear organized way No job is beneath you and you lead from the frontltbrgtltligtltulgtHow we WorkltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe love the tools we use Heres our gotosltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt Linear for issue trackingltligtltligt GitHub as source controlltligtltligt Sentry for error reportingltligtltligt Slack for internal communicationltligtltligt Notion as a knowledge baseltligtltligt Figma for design collaborationltbrgtltligtltulgtOur Commitment to Diversity and InclusionltbrgtltbrgtQuinn is proud to celebrate diversity and is committed to building an inclusive workplace regardless of race color religion sex including pregnancy and gender identity national origin political affiliation sexual orientation marital status disability genetic information age membership in an employee organization retaliation parental status military service or other nonmerit factorsltbrgtltbrgtIf you need any accommodations please inform our team upon initial connectionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOur Ideal Candidateltbrgtltulgtltligt4 years of experience at a highgrowth startup consulting firm or toptier investment bankltligtltligt3 years of Machine Learning experience including building deploying and maintaining systemsltligtltligtStrong work ethic persistence humility and detailorientation ability to plan and execute independentlyltligtltligtExcel in startups you come from a diverse background and thrive in a fastpaced startup environmentltligtltligtUnderstanding of data structures data modeling and software architectureltligtltligtDeep knowledge of maths probability statistics and algorithmsltligtltligtAbility to write robust code in Python Java and RltligtltligtFamiliarity with machine learning frameworks like Keras or PyTorch and libraries like scikitlearnltligtltligtWork authorization in the USltligtltulgt
